message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I know you'll love! I'm offering it to you for $135. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  I can go down to $128 for you.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me in the middle at $126?
